alert.note: Alert for McHenry (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 12 at 12:35PM CDT until October 12 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MCHENRY COUNTY... At 1235 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Spring Grove, or near Fox Lake, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Locally 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... McHenry, Fox Lake, Johnsburg, Lakemoor, Spring Grove, Wonder Lake, Pistakee Highlands, Genoa City, Richmond, McCullom Lake, Ringwood and Greenwood. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
